job_description: .Net Full Stack Developer - Remote in Chicago Metro Area Only - job post Sawyer Consulting Chicago, IL Up to $123,213 a year -  Full-time, Contract Responded to 51-74% of applications in the past 30 days, typically within 1 day. Apply now Apply now save-icon Job details Salary Up to $123,213 a year Job Type Full-time Contract Qualifications Bachelor's (Required) Microsoft Development: 4 years (Required) .NET: 4 years (Required) Lead Development: 1 year (Required) Full Job Description .Net Developer & Architect Please Note: United States Citizen or Green Card Holders Only Currently fully remote position but candidates must reside in the Washington D.C. and Chicago metro areas Sawyer Consulting is a Maryland-based company that specializes in business architecture, data architecture, and technology architecture support on complex regulatory IT programs throughout the Federal government. Sawyer Consulting teams with systems integrators to provide specialized business and technical knowledge in the industries that are at the center of recent Federal and State regulatory reforms. We help our clients bridge the gap between complex regulatory intent and practical IT system development. We are seeking multiple developers to join our team in the Washington D.C. area. If you are excited about learning and working with new technologies including cloud computing and development, then please send us your resume. As a .Net Developer: You will work with a team in designing, developing and implementing technical solutions in Microsoft environments using Visual Studio and Visual Studio Code You have a passion for Microsoft technology; specifically in helping our client in maintaining traditional .Net On-Premises systems and the transition of those systems to modern frameworks and cloud-native solutions You will participate with team members in the analysis and design of software solutions Openly share your skills and knowledge with others on the team You are experienced in enterprise software development using the Microsoft technology stack Participate in architecture and code reviews You’re certified and/or are eager to get certified for one or more of the previously mentioned technologies You are curious, proactive and enjoy working together with the team Qualifications: U.S. Citizen or Green Card required Bachelor’s degree Required Work Experience: 3 years w/Bachelors Degree Fully remote position but you must reside in the Washington D.C. and Chicago metro areas in case position changes to hybrid in the future Ability to manage and work independently alongside a larger team Ability to solve problems and learn business rules and processes Technical Skills: 3+ years programming and software development experience with .Net Experience developing complex applications with common frameworks using Microsoft Visual Studio, Visual Studio Code, C#, Core, .NET, Asp.NET, MVC, WCF, SSIS, SSRS, SQL Server, and/or Team Foundation Server Experience with the Python Programming Language, SAS, and other Data Scientist tools is a plus (not required) Experience with systems with multiple integration points, distributed architecture, multiple concurrent users or receiving and processing sensitive data Experience developing software using Agile methodologies Experience implementing systems to financial users, especially financial systems related to the commodity futures, options, and swaps industry Job Type: Full-time and Contract Location: Washington D.C. and Chicago Education: Bachelor’s For immediate consideration please send your resume, contact information, citizenship status, and whether you have held a Public Trust or equivalent background check to jobs at sawyerconsulting.com and contact our recruiters at 202-525-6051. Additional details can be found at https://www.sawyerconsulting.com/jobpostings.html Job Types: Full-time, Contract Pay: Up to $123,213.00 per year Experience level: 3 years Schedule: 8 hour shift Monday to Friday Education: Bachelor's (Required) Experience: Microsoft Development: 4 years (Required) .NET: 4 years (Required) Lead Development: 1 year (Required) Work Location: One location Hiring Insights Application response rate: 61% Hiring 2 candidates for this role Urgently hiring Job activity Posted 1 day ago If you require alternative methods of application or screening, you must approach the employer directly to request this as Indeed is not responsible for the employer's application process.
